Package org.apache.twill.filesystem

Contains HDFS location classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Location
    This interface defines the location and operations of a resource on the filesystem.
    LocationFactory
    Factory for creating instance of Location.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileContextLocationFactory
    A LocationFactory implementation that uses FileContext to create Location.
    ForwardingLocationFactory  
    HDFSLocationFactory Deprecated
    Deprecated since 0.7.0.
    LocalLocationFactory
    A LocationFactory for creating local file Location.
    LocationFactories
    Providers helper methods for creating different LocationFactory.

Package org.apache.twill.filesystem Description

Contains HDFS location classes.
